checkConnection: Please check your connection and try again.

notFoundPage.title: 404 - Page Not Found
notFoundPage.message: The page you're looking for doesn't exist.

serverErrorPage.title: 500 - Server Error
serverErrorPage.message: Something went wrong on our end. Please try again later.

networkError.title: Network Error
networkError.message: Unable to connect to the server. Please check your connection.

unauthorized.title: Unauthorized
unauthorized.message: You don't have permission to access this resource.

forbiddenPage.title: Forbidden
forbiddenPage.message: Access to this resource is forbidden.

timeout.title: Request Timeout
timeout.message: The request took too long to complete.
